AI Description: Numexpr is a fast numerical expression evaluator for NumPy. With it, expressions that operate on arrays (like '3*a+4*b') are accelerated and use less memory than doing the same calculation in Python. In addition, its multi-threaded capabilities can make use of all your cores in a CPU.
Core Features: Accelerated Numerical Expression Evaluation For Numpy Arrays, Optimized For Performance & Memory Usage, Multi-Threaded Capabilities For Improved Speed Using Multiple Cpu Cores
General Tags: Numerical Computation, Numerical Expressions, Array Operations, Performance Optimization, Multi-Threading
